column2: an A.M. Eatery////This place is by far my favorite place
column4: but well worth it.  All the Benny dishes are delicious!! Bacon is on point
column5: I prefer to sit at the bar
column6: the waitresses there are very welcoming and talkative.  Love the vibe of this place
column7: as the food is fantastic! They just need to make one closer to my house.  Lol
